name: Squorm
description:
This is my submission to the  Github Game Off 2021 (Theme: Bug)

Source: https://github.com/MrBundles/Game_Off_2021_Bug

A Study in Worm-Like Movement in a Minimalistic Art Style

Note: Please see known issues below, and let me know if you find any other game-breaking bugs while you play.

- Controls -

Mouse - The Sqworm will move towards anywhere you click (don't drag)

- Use of Theme -

The player controls a worm-like character.

- Known Issues -

-Switches will sometimes stop working if pulled several times in quick succession. This issue can be resolved by resetting the level.

-Sqworm can occasionally get stuck in certain positions. This issue can be resolved by resetting the level.

- Updates -

Rev 1.3 resolved the following issues

- Completing a level does not unlock it on the level select screen. As a result the player could not revisit levels to play them again.
